text: This conversation has started with an error message indicating that the user is unable to connect using SOCK_RAW sockets (a type of IP protocol), which requires root privileges. The message also warns about a security vulnerability in the CSM (Content Security Policy System) server.

sentiment.analysis: The sentiment of this conversation is negative, rating 1. The user has received an error message from a tool (csmcloud-server), which indicates that the operation could not be performed due to insufficient permissions (missing cap_net_raw+p capability or setuid). This error typically occurs when there's a lack of administrative privileges, suggesting potential issues in executing certain commands or tasks.
